name: Cici
greetingText: Gak berasa sudah semakin tua nih ya, udah umur 27 tahun aja
wishText: Semoga sehat selalu & jangan kasarr-kasar ya ama Dennis. Ditunggu nanti petarungan kungfu vs wushu 4 tahun lagi
text1: Oh iya, today is your birthday!!! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! You have to get older, but you don't have to grow up
text2: But, it's okay. You're amazing just the way you are .
text3: I want to give you a few advice
text4: Hopefully, this can motivate you to be a better person.
text4Adjective: First, try to pick up a new skill first. You may study from various platforms in this day, from Coursera, YouTube, and other sources.
text5Entry: Second, go on a trip, such as go around Indonesia and other countries, rather than shopping with your money. Why?
text5Content: Traveling, in my opinion, alters your view on the world. You can grow more independent, learn to be humble, and appreciate and understand other people. The most crucial factor is that you still have time and are in excellent health.
smiley: Oke sekian sampai sini ya. Codingnya lumayan cape nih hehehe
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
